firebaseErrors.auth/email-already-in-use: The email address is already in use by another account.
firebaseErrors.auth/invalid-email: The email address is badly formatted.
firebaseErrors.auth/operation-not-allowed: The email/password account is not enabled.
firebaseErrors.auth/user-not-found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier. The user may have been deleted.
firebaseErrors.auth/wrong-password: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password.
firebaseErrors.auth/invalid-credential: The supplied auth credentials are invalid.
firebaseErrors.storage/unauthorized: User does not have permission to access the object.

avatarUpload.label: Click here or drag and drop an image to upload
avatarUpload.fileInfo: Image must be a .jpg, .jpeg, .png or .gif file and less than 5MB in size.

addClient.title: Add Client
addClient.description: Add a new client to the system. Clients are used to group projects together.
